<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:15.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:15.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt">黄衫女子的武功似乎与周芷若乃是一路，飘忽灵动，变幻无方，但举手抬足之间却是正而不邪，如说周芷若形似鬼魅，那黄衫女子便是态拟神仙。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:17.5pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:15.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:15.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt">这段描写出自《倚天屠龙记》第三十八回。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:15.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:15.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:15.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt">“</span><span style="font-size:15.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#262626;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">九阴神抓</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:15.0pt;
font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt">”</span><span style="font-size:15.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt">本是《九阴真经》中的上乘武功，但当初梅超风夫妇由于拿到的《九阴真经》不完整，学不到里面的内功心法，硬是把这门上乘武功练到了邪路上，于是就成了</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:15.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt">“</span><span style="font-size:15.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#262626;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">九阴白骨爪</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:15.0pt;
font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt">”</span><span style="font-size:15.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt">。周芷若为求速成，也练就了这门邪功。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:15.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:15.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:15.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt">但黄衫女子乃出身武林名门（相传是杨过和小龙女的后人），自然修炼的是正宗的《九阴真经》。虽然武功路数与周芷若本同属一脉，但更加</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:15.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt">“</span><span style="font-size:15.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#262626;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">醇真深厚</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:15.0pt;
font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt">”</span><span style="font-size:15.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt">，自然也更胜一筹。这是金庸武侠中</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:15.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt">“</span><span style="font-size:15.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#262626;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">正宗</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:15.0pt;
font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt">”</span><span style="font-size:15.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt">武功胜过</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:15.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt">“</span><span style="font-size:15.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";

mso-bidi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt">现在网上的技术文章空前繁荣，想读都读不过来。胡峰同学在他的微信公众号</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:15.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;

mso-bidi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt">上，发过一篇文章《技术干货的选择性问题》，讨论的就是技术人员在当前技术文章爆炸的情况下如何取舍的问题。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:15.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;

mso-bidi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt">在这里，我们从另一个角度来讨论一下这个问题。如果一篇技术文章，仅仅是对于所涉及技术的官方文档（</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:15.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;

"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#262626;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">或</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:15.0pt;
font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";

mso-bidi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt">）的复述，甚至只是个翻译，那么就价值不高。换句话说，如果我们能通过阅读官方文档学到同样的知识，那为什么要看你写的技术文章呢？官方文档自然更权威，直接阅读它能确保不会遗漏重要的东西。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:15.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
